about_the_game:
The Space Engineers 2 Pioneer Edition DLC is an extension package to the Space Engineers 2 game. 

It is a special package for early explorers, featuring a breathtaking soundtrack, exclusive content, and the chance to directly support the game’s development.

Dive into the world of Space Engineers 2 at its earliest stage, with thrilling updates on the way, and enjoy the official soundtrack, a creative vault filled with concept art sketches, behind-the-scenes materials from the developers, and stunning exclusive wallpapers.

And there is more to come! As Space Engineers 2 evolves, we plan to bring even more exclusive content to the Pioneer Edition, including new music tracks, wallpapers and concept art, and other exciting materials along the way.

Thanks for being part of this journey with us!

Space Engineers 2 Pioneer Edition DLC includes:

  • Official Soundtrack: Be among the first to enjoy epic tracks from Karel Antonin, inspired by a rich tapestry of ethnic styles, including Eastern European, Arabian, Indian, and Northern European influences. The score blends traditional instruments with modern synthesizers, all brought to life by a professional symphonic orchestra.

  • Creative Vault: Discover the creative origins of Space Engineers 2 with a collection of early concept art and see how the game is coming together with exclusive behind-the-scenes materials, developer notes, and other exciting insights.

  • Exclusive Wallpapers: Discover a set of exclusive wallpapers for PC and phone, featuring beautifully realistic spaceships and bring the game's ambiance to your screens.

Note: The content for the Space Engineers 2 Pioneer Edition DLC can be found on your local drive in the following folder: Steam\steamapps\common\SpaceEngineers2\PioneerEdition

The Space Engineers 2 Pioneer Edition DLC is an extension package to the Space Engineers 2 game. 

It is a special package for early explorers, featuring a breathtaking soundtrack, exclusive content, and the chance to directly support the game’s development.

And there is more to come! As Space Engineers 2 evolves, we plan to bring even more exclusive content to the Pioneer Edition, including new music tracks, wallpapers and concept art, and other exciting materials along the way.

Thanks for being part of this journey with us!

Space Engineers 2 Pioneer Edition DLC includes:

The score blends traditional instruments with modern synthesizers, all brought to life by a professional symphonic orchestra.

movies.name: SE2 - OST - Welcome to the Almagest

name: Space Engineers 2 Pioneer Edition

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Microsoft Windows 10 (latest SP) 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel i3 @ 3.0 GHz or higher (or AMD equivalent)
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce 1660 Super / Radeon RX 5600 XT or higher
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX® compatible on-board
  • Additional Notes: No internet connection needed for single player
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Microsoft Windows 10 (latest SP) 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel i7 @ 4.5 GHz or higher (or AMD equivalent)
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce 2080 Ti / 3080 / Radeon RX 6800 or higher
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX® compatible on-board
  • Additional Notes: No internet connection needed for single player

short_description: The Space Engineers 2 Pioneer Edition DLC is an extension package to the Space Engineers 2 game.  It is a special package for early explorers, featuring a breathtaking soundtrack, exclusive content, and the chance to directly support the game’s development.
